author: mosheblox
content:
Hey, just a question, can a VC *safely* avoid calling `prepare_beacon_proposer` and instead simply override the `feeRecipient` address in blocks it receives from BN before signing & submitting them?

Pseudo-flow:
```python
block = beacon_node.produce_block(slot, randao_reveal)
block.body.execution_payload.fee_recipient = '<some_address>'
signed_block = signer.sign_block(block)
beacon_node.submit_block(signed_block)
```
